data.name: CreateLegalActionAssigment
CreateMonitoredActivityAssignment
ReadGlobalReassignment
data.value: select top(1) CREATED_TIMESTAMP, OVERRIDE_FLAG, BUSINESS_OBJ_CODE, ASSIGN_REASON_CODE, SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, OSP_ROLE_CODE, OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, SPD_GENERATED_ID1, OFF_GENERATED_ID1, OSP_ROLE_COD, OSP_EFFECTIVE_DAT from CKT_GLOBAL_REASSGN where CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp

data.name: ReadInfrastructure
data.value: select SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, BUSINESS_OBJECT_CD, DENORM_NUMERIC_12 from CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE where (DENORM_NUMERIC_12 = @denormNumeric12) and (BUSINESS_OBJECT_CD = @businessObjectCd)

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, END_DT from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadLegalActionAssigment
data.value: select LGA_IDENTIFIER, OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE, OSP_ROLE_CODE, OFF_GENERATED_ID, SPD_GENERATED_ID, EFFECTIVE_DT, END_DT, REASON_CODE, OVERRIDE_IND, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST from CKT_LA_SERV_PROV where (@ospRoleCode = OSP_ROLE_CODE) and (@ospEffectiveDate = OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE) and (@offGeneratedId = OFF_GENERATED_ID) and (@spdGeneratedId = SPD_GENERATED_ID) and (EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt) and (END_DT = @endDt) and (REASON_CODE = @reasonCode)

data.name: ReadMonitoredActivity
data.value: select SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, CLOSURE_REASON_COD, INF_SYS_GEN_ID from CKT_MONITORED_ACT where (@infSysGenId = INF_SYS_GEN_ID) and (CLOSURE_REASON_COD = ' ')

data.name: ReadMonitoredActivityAssignment
data.value: select REASON_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, OVERRIDE_IND, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, MAC_ID from CKT_ASSGN_MNT_ACT where (@macId = MAC_ID) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate)

data.name: ReadOffice1
data.value: select top(1) OFFICE_ID, OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE where OFFICE_ID = @officeId

data.name: ReadOffice2
data.value: select top(1) OFFICE_ID, OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE where OFFICE_ID = @officeId

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProvider1
data.value: select top(1) SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR where (EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (ROLE_CODE = @roleCode) and (OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProvider2
data.value: select top(1) SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR where (EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (ROLE_CODE = @roleCode) and (OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProvider3
data.value: select top(1) SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR where (EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (ROLE_CODE = @roleCode) and (OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadServiceProvider1
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = @servicePrvderId

data.name: ReadServiceProvider2
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = @servicePrvderId

data.name: UpdateLegalActionAssigment
data.value: update CKT_LA_SERV_PROV set END_DT = @endDt, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp

data.name: UpdateMonitoredActivityAssignment
data.value: update CKT_ASSGN_MNT_ACT set DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (SPD_ID = @spdId) and (OFF_ID = @offId) and (OSP_CODE = @ospCode) and (OSP_DATE = @ospDate) and (MAC_ID = @macId)
